short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: A quick kana quiz on every new tab.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Hone your Japanese skills with a quick quiz every time you open a new tab.

Choose between Hiragana, Katakana, or a mix of both. The more often you get a character right, the less it'll be shown - helping you focus on the characters you struggle with and improve quickly.
